Relevant channels may include hotlines, trade unions (where people in the workforce are
unionised) or works councils, or other grievance mechanisms operated by the relevant
undertaking or by a third party.
AR 31. In explaining whether and how the undertaking knows that people in its own workforce are
aware of and trust any of these channels, the undertaking may provide relevant and reliable
data about the effectiveness of these channels from the perspective of the people concerned.
